Severe coughing fits, whooping sound, vomiting, exhaustion
Mononucleosis
Illness: Fatigue, sore throat, fever, swollen lymph nodes in neck and armpits, headache, skin rash, swollen spleen

Symptoms: Strep Throat
Illness: Sudden sore throat, pain when swallowing, fever, red and swollen tonsils (sometimes with white patches or streaks of pus), tiny red spots on the roof of the mouth, headache, body aches, rash

Symptoms: Tetanus
Illness: Jaw cramping (lockjaw), sudden involuntary muscle spasms (often in the stomach), painful muscle stiffness all over the body, trouble swallowing, seizures, headache, fever, sweating

Symptoms: Diphtheria
Illness: Thick, gray membrane covering the throat and tonsils, sore throat, hoarseness, swollen glands (bull neck), difficulty breathing, rapid breathing, nasal discharge, fever, chills, malaise

Symptoms: Polio
Illness: Fever, sore throat, headache, vomiting, fatigue, meningitis (stiffness of back/neck, pain in limbs), loss of reflexes, severe muscle aches or weakness, loose and floppy limbs (flaccid paralysis)

Symptoms: Rubella (German Measles)
Illness: Mild fever, headache, stuffy or runny nose, inflamed red eyes, enlarged tender lymph nodes at base of skull/back of neck/behind ears, fine pink rash starting on face and spreading downwards

Symptoms: Genital Herpes
Illness: Pain, itching, or tenderness in the genital area; small red bumps or tiny white blisters; ulcers (form when blisters rupture and ooze or bleed); scabs (form as ulcers heal); flu-like symptoms (fever, body aches, swollen lymph nodes during initial outbreak)

Symptoms: Human Papillomavirus (HPV) Infection
Illness: Genital warts (small, flesh-colored or gray swellings in the genital area, or cauliflower-like bumps); symptoms related to cervical, anal, or throat cancers if specific types progress

Symptoms: Gonorrhea
Illness: Painful urination, pus-like discharge from the penis, pain or swelling in one testicle (men); increased vaginal discharge, painful urination, vaginal bleeding between periods, abdominal pain, pelvic pain (women)

Symptoms: Syphilis
Illness: Painless sore (chancre) at infection site; skin rash (often on palms and soles), swollen lymph nodes, fever, sore throat, patchy hair loss, muscle aches, fatigue; damage to brain, nerves, eyes, heart, blood vessels, liver, bones, joints (late stage)

Symptoms: Chlamydia
Illness: Discharge from penis, burning sensation during urination, pain and swelling in one or both testicles (men); abnormal vaginal discharge (may have an odor), burning sensation during urination, pain during intercourse, lower abdominal pain (women)

Symptoms: Candidiasis (Thrush)
Illness: Oral: white patches on tongue/inner cheeks/roof of mouth/gums/tonsils (may bleed if scraped), redness, soreness, difficulty swallowing; Vaginal: itching and irritation in vagina/vulva, burning sensation, redness/swelling of vulva, thick white odor-free vaginal discharge (cottage cheese appearance)

Symptoms: Athlete's Foot
Illness: Itchy, scaly rash (often between toes), stinging, burning, discomfort, blisters, cracking and peeling skin, dry scaly skin on soles/sides of feet

Symptoms: Cellulitis
Illness: Red, swollen, warm, and tender area of skin; pain; skin may look pitted; blisters may form; fever and chills

Symptoms: Impetigo
Illness: Red sores that quickly rupture, ooze, and form a yellow-brown crust; itching; painless, fluid-filled blisters (bullous type)

Symptoms: Sjogren's Syndrome
Illness: Dry eyes (burning, itching, gritty sensation), dry mouth (difficulty swallowing/speaking, increased dental cavities), fatigue, joint pain, swelling, stiffness, swollen salivary glands

Symptoms: Graves' Disease
Illness: Anxiety, irritability, fine tremor of hands/fingers, heat sensitivity, increased perspiration, weight loss, goiter, change in menstrual cycles, erectile dysfunction, frequent bowel movements, bulging eyes, fatigue, thick red skin on shins/feet (rare)

Symptoms: Hashimoto's Thyroiditis
Illness: Fatigue, sluggishness, increased sensitivity to cold, constipation, pale dry skin, puffy face, brittle nails, hair loss, enlarged tongue, unexplained weight gain, muscle aches/tenderness/stiffness, joint pain/stiffness, depression, memory lapses, goiter

Symptoms: Alopecia Areata
Illness: Patchy hair loss (often round/oval on scalp, beard, eyebrows, eyelashes), sudden hair loss, nail pitting/white spots/roughness

Symptoms: Vitiligo
Illness: Loss of skin color in patches (depigmentation) on skin, hair (premature whitening/graying), and mucous membranes (inside mouth/nose)

Symptoms: Myasthenia Gravis
Illness: Muscle weakness worsening with activity and improving with rest; drooping eyelids (ptosis); blurred or double vision (diplopia); changes in facial expression; difficulty swallowing (dysphagia); shortness of breath; impaired speech (dysarthria)

Symptoms: Lung Cancer
Illness: Persistent cough, coughing up blood, chest pain (worse with deep breathing/coughing/laughing), hoarseness, shortness of breath, unexplained weight loss, fatigue, recurring bronchitis or pneumonia

Symptoms: Breast Cancer
Illness: Lump or thickening in breast or armpit, change in breast size/shape/appearance, skin dimpling/puckering, newly inverted nipple, redness or pitting of breast skin, nipple discharge (not breast milk)

Symptoms: Prostate Cancer
Illness: Trouble urinating, decreased force in urine stream, blood in semen, blood in urine, bone pain, erectile dysfunction, unexplained weight loss

Symptoms: Colorectal Cancer
Illness: Change in bowel habits (diarrhea, constipation, narrow stool), rectal bleeding, blood in stool, persistent abdominal discomfort (cramps, gas, pain), feeling of incomplete bowel emptying, weakness, fatigue, unexplained weight loss

Symptoms: Pancreatic Cancer
Illness: Abdominal pain radiating to back, loss of appetite, unintended weight loss, jaundice (yellowing skin/eyes), light-colored stools, dark urine, itchy skin, new/worsening diabetes, nausea, vomiting, fatigue

Symptoms: Ovarian Cancer
Illness: Abdominal bloating or swelling, quickly feeling full when eating, weight loss, pelvic discomfort, changes in bowel habits (constipation), frequent need to urinate

Symptoms: Bladder Cancer
Illness: Blood in urine (hematuria - bright red or cola-colored), frequent urination, painful urination, back pain, pelvic pain

Symptoms: Kidney Cancer (Renal Cell Carcinoma)
Illness: Blood in urine (hematuria), persistent pain in back/side below ribs, loss of appetite, unexplained weight loss, tiredness, intermittent fever

Symptoms: Thyroid Cancer
Illness: Lump (nodule) in neck, voice changes (hoarseness), difficulty swallowing, pain in neck/throat, swollen lymph nodes in neck

Symptoms: Lymphoma
Illness: Painless swelling of lymph nodes (neck, armpits, groin), persistent fatigue, fever, night sweats, unexplained weight loss, itchy skin, shortness of breath

Symptoms: Skin Cancer (Non-melanoma)
Illness: Basal Cell: pearly/waxy bump, flat flesh-colored/brown scar-like lesion, sores that heal and return; Squamous Cell: firm red nodule, flat lesion with scaly/crusted surface

Symptoms: Heart Failure (Congestive Heart Failure)
Illness: Shortness of breath (exertional or when lying down), fatigue, weakness, swelling (edema) in legs/ankles/feet, rapid/irregular heartbeat, persistent cough/wheezing with white/pink blood-tinged phlegm, reduced exercise ability, abdominal swelling

Symptoms: Arrhythmia
Illness: Fluttering in chest, racing heartbeat (tachycardia), slow heartbeat (bradycardia), chest pain, shortness of breath, dizziness, lightheadedness, fainting (syncope)

Symptoms: Peripheral Artery Disease (PAD)
Illness: Painful cramping in hip/thigh/calf muscles after activity (claudication), leg numbness/weakness, coldness in lower leg/foot, non-healing sores on toes/feet/legs, leg color change, hair loss on feet/legs, shiny leg skin, weak/no pulse in legs/feet, erectile dysfunction

Symptoms: Deep Vein Thrombosis (DVT)
Illness: Swelling in affected leg, pain/tenderness in leg (often calf, like a cramp), warm skin on affected area, red/discolored skin on affected area

Symptoms: Pulmonary Embolism
Illness: Sudden shortness of breath, chest pain (sharp, worse with deep breath/cough), cough (may be bloody), rapid/irregular heartbeat, lightheadedness, dizziness, excessive sweating, fever, leg pain/swelling (if from DVT)

Symptoms: Angina
Illness: Chest pain/discomfort (pressure, squeezing, fullness), pain radiating to arm/neck/jaw/shoulder/back, nausea, fatigue, shortness of breath, sweating, dizziness

Symptoms: COPD (Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease)
Illness: Shortness of breath (especially during activity), wheezing, chest tightness, chronic cough with mucus, frequent respiratory infections, lack of energy, unintended weight loss, ankle/feet/leg swelling

Symptoms: Emphysema
Illness: Shortness of breath (primary, worsens over time), chronic cough (often little mucus), wheezing, chest tightness, barrel chest appearance (later stages), fatigue, difficulty concentrating

Symptoms: Pulmonary Fibrosis
Illness: Shortness of breath (dyspnea), dry hacking cough, fatigue, unexplained weight loss, aching muscles/joints, clubbing (widening/rounding of finger/toe tips)

Symptoms: Sleep Apnea
Illness: Loud snoring, witnessed breathing pauses during sleep, gasping for air during sleep, awakening with dry mouth, morning headache, excessive daytime sleepiness, difficulty concentrating, irritability

Symptoms: Peptic Ulcer
Illness: Burning stomach pain (worse between meals/at night, relieved by food/antacids), fullness, bloating, belching, fatty food intolerance, heartburn, nausea

Symptoms: Diverticulitis
Illness: Persistent abdominal pain (usually lower left side), nausea, vomiting, fever, abdominal tenderness, constipation or diarrhea, bloating

Symptoms: Gastritis
Illness: Gnawing or burning ache/pain (indigestion) in upper abdomen (may worsen/improve with eating), nausea, vomiting, feeling of fullness after eating, loss of appetite

Symptoms: Generalized Anxiety Disorder
Illness: Persistent excessive worry, overthinking worst-case scenarios, perceiving threats, difficulty handling uncertainty, indecisiveness, inability to relax, restlessness, feeling on edge, difficulty concentrating, fatigue, irritability, muscle tension, trouble sleeping

Symptoms: Panic Disorder
Illness: Recurrent unexpected panic attacks (intense fear, severe physical reactions), feeling of impending doom/danger, fear of loss of control/death, rapid pounding heart, sweating, trembling, shortness of breath, throat tightness, chills, hot flashes, nausea, abdominal cramping, chest pain, headache, dizziness, numbness/tingling, feeling of unreality/detachment

Symptoms: Obsessive-Compulsive Disorder (OCD)
Illness: Obsessions (recurrent intrusive thoughts/urges/images causing distress) AND/OR compulsions (repetitive behaviors/mental acts driven by obsessions), time-consuming, causing significant distress/impairment

Symptoms: Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder (PTSD)
Illness: Intrusive memories (flashbacks, nightmares), avoidance of trauma reminders, negative changes in thinking/mood (hopelessness, memory problems, detachment, loss of interest), changes in physical/emotional reactions (easily startled, always on guard, self-destructive behavior, sleep/concentration issues, irritability, guilt, shame)

Symptoms: Schizophrenia
Illness: Delusions (false beliefs), hallucinations (seeing/hearing things not there), disorganized thinking/speech (word salad), disorganized/abnormal motor behavior, negative symptoms (reduced ability to function, lack of emotion, social withdrawal)

Symptoms: ADHD (Attention-Deficit/Hyperactivity Disorder)
Illness: Inattention: difficulty sustaining attention, not listening, fails to finish tasks, difficulty organizing, avoids sustained mental effort, loses things, easily distracted, forgetful; Hyperactivity-Impulsivity: fidgets, leaves seat, runs/climbs inappropriately, unable to play quietly, 'on the go,' talks excessively, blurts out answers, difficulty waiting turn, interrupts

Symptoms: Autism Spectrum Disorder
Illness: Deficits in social communication/interaction (e.g., social-emotional reciprocity, nonverbal communication, relationships); Restricted, repetitive patterns of behavior/interests/activities (e.g., stereotyped movements, insistence on sameness, fixated interests, sensory hyper/hyporeactivity)

Symptoms: Sciatica
Illness: Pain radiating from lower spine to buttock and down back of leg (usually one side), pain varies (mild ache to sharp/burning), numbness, tingling, muscle weakness in affected leg/foot, pain worsens with sitting/coughing/sneezing

Symptoms: Carpal Tunnel Syndrome
Illness: Numbness/tingling in hand/fingers (thumb, index, middle, ring), pain in wrist/palm/forearm, hand weakness, tendency to drop objects, shock-like sensations to fingers

Symptoms: Amyotrophic Lateral Sclerosis (ALS)
Illness: Progressive muscle weakness, muscle twitches (fasciculations), muscle cramps, muscle stiffness (spasticity), slurred/nasal speech (dysarthria), difficulty chewing/swallowing (dysphagia), difficulty with fine motor skills, limb weakness, eventual paralysis

Symptoms: Huntington's Disease
Illness: Involuntary jerking/writhing movements (chorea), muscle rigidity/contracture (dystonia), slow/abnormal eye movements, impaired gait/posture/balance, difficulty speaking/swallowing, cognitive impairments (difficulty organizing, lack of impulse control, memory issues), psychiatric disorders (depression, OCD, mania)

Symptoms: Narcolepsy
Illness: Excessive daytime sleepiness (EDS), cataplexy (sudden loss of muscle tone, triggered by emotions), sleep paralysis, hallucinations (hypnagogic/hypnopompic), fragmented nighttime sleep

Symptoms: Cushing's Syndrome
Illness: Weight gain (midsection, upper back, face - 'moon face', between shoulders - 'buffalo hump'), pink/purple stretch marks, thinning fragile skin, easy bruising, slow healing, acne, fatigue, muscle weakness, depression, anxiety, irritability, high blood pressure, glucose intolerance, headache, bone loss

Symptoms: Polycystic Ovary Syndrome (PCOS)
Illness: Irregular/absent menstrual periods, excess androgen signs (excess facial/body hair - hirsutism, severe acne, male-pattern baldness), polycystic ovaries on ultrasound, infertility, weight gain/difficulty losing weight, insulin resistance, skin tags, darkened skin patches (acanthosis nigricans)

Symptoms: Osteoporosis
Illness: Back pain (from fractured/collapsed vertebra), loss of height, stooped posture, bone breaking easily

Symptoms: Tendinitis
Illness: Dull ache, tenderness, mild swelling around tendon, pain worsening with activity, grating/crackling sensation (crepitus) with movement

Symptoms: Bursitis
Illness: Achy/stiff joint, pain worsening with movement/pressure, swelling/redness over joint, limited range of motion

Symptoms: Scoliosis
Illness: Uneven shoulders, one prominent shoulder blade, uneven waist, one hip higher, leaning to one side, back pain

Symptoms: Herniated Disc
Illness: Arm or leg pain (depending on location), numbness/tingling in area served by affected nerves, muscle weakness in area served by nerves, pain worsening with certain movements (sitting, bending, coughing)

Symptoms: Rosacea
Illness: Facial redness (persistent blushing/flushing), swollen red bumps (papules/pustules), eye problems (dry, irritated, swollen eyelids), enlarged nose (rhinophyma - rare)

Symptoms: Warts
Illness: Small, fleshy, grainy bumps; flesh-colored, white, pink, or tan; rough to touch; may have black pinpoints (clotted blood vessels)

Symptoms: Hives (Urticaria)
Illness: Raised, itchy welts (wheals) on skin; welts can be red, pink, or flesh-colored, vary in size/shape, appear/fade repeatedly; burning or stinging

Symptoms: Contact Dermatitis
Illness: Red rash or bumps, severe itching, dry, cracked, scaly skin, blisters and oozing, swelling, burning, tenderness on skin exposed to irritant/allergen

Symptoms: Sickle Cell Anemia
Illness: Episodes of pain (pain crises), swelling of hands/feet, frequent infections, delayed growth/puberty, vision problems, fatigue, jaundice

Symptoms: Thalassemia
Illness: Fatigue, weakness, pale/yellowish skin (jaundice), facial bone deformities, slow growth, dark urine, abdominal swelling

Symptoms: Polycythemia Vera
Illness: Headache, dizziness, itchiness (especially after warm bath), facial redness (plethora), fatigue, shortness of breath, numbness/tingling/burning/weakness in hands/feet/arms/legs, early satiety, left upper abdominal pain (enlarged spleen), unexplained weight loss, unusual bleeding/bruising

Symptoms: Chronic Kidney Disease (CKD)
Illness: Nausea, vomiting, loss of appetite, fatigue, weakness, sleep problems, changes in urination, decreased mental sharpness, muscle twitches/cramps, swelling of feet/ankles, persistent itching, chest pain, shortness of breath, high blood pressure

Symptoms: Glomerulonephritis
Illness: Pink or cola-colored urine (hematuria), foamy urine (proteinuria), high blood pressure, swelling (edema) in face/hands/feet/abdomen, fatigue, urinating less

Symptoms: Interstitial Cystitis (Painful Bladder Syndrome)
Illness: Chronic pelvic pain, perineal pain, persistent urgent need to urinate, frequent urination (small amounts), pain/discomfort while bladder fills (relief after urinating), pain during intercourse

Symptoms: Macular Degeneration (Age-related)
Illness: Blurred/distorted central vision, dark/blurry areas or blind spot in central vision, diminished/changed color perception, straight lines appearing wavy, difficulty recognizing faces

Symptoms: Diabetic Retinopathy
Illness: Spots/dark strings floating in vision (floaters), blurred vision, fluctuating vision, impaired color vision, dark/empty areas in vision, vision loss

Symptoms: Stye (Hordeolum)
Illness: Red, painful lump near eyelid edge (like boil/pimple), eyelid swelling, tearing, light sensitivity, gritty sensation in eye

Symptoms: Laryngitis
Illness: Hoarseness, weak voice/voice loss, tickling sensation/rawness in throat, sore throat, dry cough, difficulty swallowing

Symptoms: Vertigo
Illness: Sensation of spinning/whirling, loss of balance, nausea, vomiting, abnormal rhythmic eye movements (nystagmus); symptoms often triggered by head position changes

Symptoms: Tinnitus
Illness: Perception of noise/ringing in ears (ringing, buzzing, roaring, clicking, hissing, humming) when no external sound is present

Symptoms: Roseola
Illness: Sudden high fever, followed by rash of small pink spots/patches (starts on trunk, spreads to neck/face/arms/legs) once fever breaks, irritability, mild diarrhea, decreased appetite, swollen eyelids, mild sore throat, runny nose, cough, swollen lymph nodes

Symptoms: HandFootMouth Disease
Illness: Fever, sore throat, malaise, painful red blister-like lesions on tongue/gums/inside cheeks, red rash (sometimes with blistering) on palms/soles/buttocks, irritability, loss of appetite

Symptoms: Scarlet Fever
Illness: Very red sore throat, fever, whitish tongue coating or 'strawberry' tongue, red sandpaper-like rash (starts on neck/chest, spreads), flushed face with pale ring around mouth, red lines in skin folds (Pastia's lines)

Symptoms: Down Syndrome
Illness: Flattened face, small head, upward slanting eyes, small ears, protruding tongue, single deep palm crease, poor muscle tone, short stature, intellectual disability, heart defects

Symptoms: Muscular Dystrophy
Illness: Progressive muscle weakness, frequent falls, difficulty rising, trouble running/jumping, waddling gait, walking on toes, large calf muscles (some types), muscle pain/stiffness, learning disabilities (some types), eventual loss of walking, breathing/heart problems

Symptoms: Marfan Syndrome
Illness: Tall slender build, long arms/legs/fingers/toes, protruding/indented sternum, high arched palate, crowded teeth, heart murmurs, extreme nearsightedness, curved spine (scoliosis), flat feet, flexible joints, stretch marks, aortic aneurysm/dissection risk

Symptoms: Scurvy
Illness: Fatigue, weakness, irritability, joint pain, swollen bleeding gums, loose teeth, poor wound healing, easy bruising, dry brittle hair, skin hemorrhages (petechiae), depression, anemia

Symptoms: Rickets
Illness: Delayed growth, bone pain/tenderness (arms, legs, pelvis, spine), muscle weakness, skeletal deformities (bowed legs, knock-knees, thickened wrists/ankles, pigeon chest), dental problems

Symptoms: Pellagra
Illness: Diarrhea, dermatitis (sun-sensitive rash, 'Casal's necklace'), dementia (confusion, memory loss, depression), glossitis (inflamed tongue), weakness, loss of appetite, abdominal pain

Symptoms: Beriberi
Illness: Wet: shortness of breath, rapid heart rate, swollen lower legs; Dry: decreased muscle function (lower legs), tingling/loss of feeling in hands/feet, pain, mental confusion, speech difficulties, difficulty walking, vomiting, involuntary eye movements, paralysis

Symptoms: Varicose Veins
Illness: Dark purple/blue veins, twisted/bulging veins (like cords), achy/heavy legs, burning, throbbing, muscle cramping, swelling in lower legs, worsened pain after prolonged sitting/standing, itching around veins, skin discoloration, ulcers near ankle (severe)

Symptoms: Chronic Fatigue Syndrome (ME/CFS)
Illness: Profound fatigue (>6 months, not improved by rest), post-exertional malaise, unrefreshing sleep, cognitive impairment ('brain fog'), orthostatic intolerance, muscle/joint pain, headaches, tender lymph nodes, recurrent sore throat

Symptoms: Restless Legs Syndrome
Illness: Uncontrollable urge to move legs due to uncomfortable sensation, symptoms worsen at rest/night, relieved by movement, sleep disruption, daytime fatigue
